job_description:
At Elara Caring, we have a unique opportunity to play a huge role in the growth of an entire home care industry. Here, each employee has the chance to make a real difference by carrying out our mission every day. Join our elite team of healthcare professionals, providing the Right Care, at the Right Time, in the Right Place.

Job Description:

Registered Nurse (RN) – Home Health PRN / Per Diem

Flexible Visits | Lafayette, IN | Pick Up When You Want

Want to keep your hospital job but earn extra income on your terms?

At Elara Caring, our PRN nurses choose when they work. Pick up visits around your life — not the other way around. This role is ideal for nurses looking for supplemental income, semi-retired nurses, parents re-entering the workforce, or clinicians who prefer flexibility over a fixed schedule.

You’ll provide meaningful, one-on-one care to patients in their homes while maintaining control of your availability.

No home health experience? We will train you.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Why PRN Nurses Like This Role
• You choose the days you’re available
• No minimum weekly hours requirement
• Accept visits that fit your schedule
• True 1:1 patient care
• No call lights, no med passes for 20+ patients
• Supportive clinical team always available
• Paid orientation and ride-along training

Perfect for:
• Nurses keeping a full-time hospital job
• Parents with school-hour availability
• Retired or semi-retired nurses
• Nurses returning to practice
• Nurses wanting extra income without overtime shifts

---------------------------------------------------------------------
What You’ll Do

As a Home Health RN, you’ll visit patients in their homes and help them safely manage their health conditions.

Responsibilities include:
• Completing routine skilled nursing visits
• Performing patient assessments
• Providing medication and disease-process education
• Monitoring wounds, vitals, and overall health status
• Communicating changes in condition to providers
• Coordinating care with therapists and care team members
• Documenting visits in the electronic medical record
• Following HIPAA and patient safety standards

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Training & Support

You won’t be sent out alone. We provide:
• Structured onboarding
• Ride-along visits with experienced clinicians
• EMR documentation training
• Ongoing clinical support and case consultation

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements
• Active, unrestricted RN license
• At least 1 year of nursing experience in any setting (hospital, SNF, clinic, rehab, etc.)
• Reliable transportation, valid driver’s license, and auto insurance
• Ability to travel within the Lafayette coverage area
• Comfort working independently in the field
• Sit, stand, bend, lift and move intermittently and be able to lift 50-100 lbs.

Preferred (not required):
• Home Health or Hospice experience
• HomeCare HomeBase (HCHB) experience
• ASN or BSN

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Important Information

This is a PRN/per diem position and is not benefit-eligible (no health insurance, PTO, or 401k).
PRN nurses are scheduled based on availability and patient needs.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

If you enjoy nursing but want flexibility, autonomy, and time to actually connect with patients, home health may be a great fit.

Apply today and work when it works for you.

We value the unique skills of veterans and military spouses. We encourage applications from military veterans and their families.

Elara Caring provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to sex (including pregnancy, childbirth or related medical conditions), race, color, age (40 and older), national origin, religion, disability, genetic information, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender reassignment, protected veteran status, or any other basis prohibited under applicable federal, state or local law. 

Elara Caring participates in E-Verify and we will provide the Federal Government with your Form I-9 information to confirm that you are authorized to work in the United States. Employers like Elara Caring can only use E-Verify once you have accepted the job offer and completed the Form I-9.

At Elara Caring, pay and compensation are determined by a variety of factors, including education, job-related knowledge, skills, training, and experience. Our compensation structure reflects the cost of labor across different U.S. geographic markets, and may vary based on location.

This is not a comprehensive list of all job responsibilities and requirements; upon request, a job description can be provided.

If you are an individual with a disability and are unable or limited in your ability to use or access our career site as a result of your disability, you may request reasonable accommodations by reaching out to recruiting@elara.com.
